attributes.comment:
These increases in fees are unconscionable! It already costs more than $30,000
to adopt a child from a foreign country, how could you think to increase this
amount? Many people can't even afford to adopt a child living in an orphange,
even though they would love to give a child a home.

Not only that, but as citizens of America, we were treated poorly by CIS
employees during our entire international adoption process. It took several
months and 3 trips to get fingerprinted before we were even approved! If you hired
people with better work ethics, maybe you could save some money.

Please rethink these increases!!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Jean
